Updated November     pm





Potter

Gov PERIOD Sam Brownback plans to pass legislation that will change the way with which education in Kansas is dealt PERIOD While most people complain about the legislation bringing about radical changes to teachers I am far more concerned about the students PERIOD

Two major changes brought about with Brownbacks legislation include forcing eighth graders to create a career plan as well as offering to any high school a  incentive for each student who graduates with skills in specific laborbased industries PERIOD

By having high schools reach for that sweet money from the government they are coercing the schools into shifting their direction from an open and free system for students to one that will focus on more laborintensive studies PERIOD The classes offered at any high school will slowly shift away from the arts and humanities to those that deal with areas that are lacking such as the agricultural industry PERIOD

The far more damaging of these two sections however includes having the eighth graders create their own career plans for their future similar to what I have experienced in European nations PERIOD

I would be a fool if I were to expect each and every student to follow the career plans they create in eighth grade PERIOD By forcing the students to create a career plan the school puts an insanely large amount of pressure on its students PERIOD How would you feel if you had to choose your future in eighth grade Brownback is destroying the students dreams before they can materialize PERIOD

And the damage this bill would cause for liberal colleges would be apparent in about two years after being passed PERIOD The enrollment in liberal arts schools will drop significantly as high schools create more linear paths for their students PERIOD With some students already worried about the job market as it is just think of the inevitable chaos PERIOD Single russian women

This bill needs to die now and Brownback needs to learn this from those that it affects  everyone PERIOD

Andrew Potter

Taos News Taos NM November   Byline SUE GOLDBERG AND JOLEEN MONTOYA DYE If you are considering applying to a vocational school community college or a public university you can begin working on applications now even though due dates may not be until spring  PERIOD Keep in mind that UNM and NMSU waive application fees for students who apply before Dec PERIOD  PERIOD Also larger scholarships that are given out by public schools such as UNM and Adams State are based on December  deadlines PERIOD go to website college essay topics

As weve previously mentioned depending on the type of school youre thinking about you will be faced with a unique set of steps that may differ from that of your peers PERIOD The bulk of the work for students who are applying to public universities community colleges or vocational schools comes second semester whereas students who are applying to private colleges or universities are required to submit their applications by early January PERIOD For this reason we will focus Novembers article on students who are applying to private schools and will address applying to public schools in detail in a future article PERIOD

If you are applying to private colleges or universities you may already feel a bit overwhelmed by the amount of work that the fall season brings PERIOD Many students anticipate that senior year will be their easiest and most playful year and as you are probably discovering on top of your studies extracurricular activities and life outside of school you now have a new job of applying to colleges PERIOD

At this point you have researched schools and have whittled down the list to a manageable number so that your workload is realistic PERIOD It can be helpful to create a spreadsheet that tracks each schools application due dates financial aid deadlines and required materials such as teacher and counselor recommendations transcripts and test scores PERIOD If your schools require recommendations it is considerate to allow your teachers and counselors at least two weeks to write these recommendations PERIOD go to site college essay topics

Some of you of you may be struggling with the dreaded college essay PERIOD This can actually be the fun part of the application PERIOD It is an opportunity to share who you are beyond your test scores and grades PERIOD We often suggest free writing without worrying about grammar staying on topic or about other people reading what you write PERIOD Often something meaningful will pop up during this exercise that you can expand on for your first draft PERIOD Dont feel discouraged if it doesnt come together right away PERIOD

A great college essay usually takes even the best writers several attempts and revisions PERIOD It is difficult to write because it requires thoughtful selfreflection and putting into words some of your most profound thoughts and life experiences PERIOD In the end it will be worth it because you will provide an authentic picture of who you are and how well you match the schools you are applying to PERIOD Also you can use your college essay as a base for scholarship essays you will be writing in the spring PERIOD We are happy to help PERIOD You are welcome to set up an appointment and we can edit your essays and make suggestions for how to develop them further PERIOD

Keep plugging away PERIOD By the time January rolls around you will have submitted all of your applications PERIOD There is still work to do but you are moving closer to the finish line PERIOD
